title: Why midscale hotel chains are snapping up standalone properties
description: Travellers often prefer midscale hotels as they offer a balance between affordability and quality, says Chander Baljee, CMD, Royal Orchid Hotels. Royal Orchid Hotels converted 11 standalone properties in 2022.
